snippet: A trade group will announce a framework that would simplify accounting for small companies, and a standards board plans to propose its first ever exceptions for private companies.
abstract: American Institute of Certified Public Accountants plans to announce creation of 'framework' that will simplify accounting for small companies that will differ from 'generally accepted accounting principles;' Financial Accounting Standards Board also plans to propose its first exceptions for private companies.
lead_paragraph: A trade group will announce a framework that would simplify accounting for small companies, and a standards board plans to propose its first ever exceptions for private companies.
